channel.itunes:author: PodcastOne / Carolla Digital
channel.title: Adam Carolla Show
channel.description:
Welcome to the Adam Carolla Show! The new home for the rantings and ravings of Adam CarollThe Adam Carolla Show is the #1 Daily Downloaded Podcast in the World. GET IT ON as Adam shares his thoughts on current events, relationships, airport security, specialty pizzas, politics, and anything else he can complain about. Five days a week and completely uncensored, Adam welcomes a wide range of guests to join him in studio for in depth interviews and a front row seat to his unparalleled ranting. Let's not forget Bryan Bishop (Bald Bryan) on sound effects.
Check it out as Adam hangs out with some of his pals like: Larry Miller, David Allen Grier, Dr. Drew Pinksy, Dana Gould, Doug Benson, and many, many more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the Adam Carolla Show! The new home for the rantings and ravings of Adam CarollThe Adam Carolla Show is the #1 Daily Downloaded Podcast in the World. GET IT ON as Adam shares his thoughts on current events, relationships,...
channel.itunes:summary:
Welcome to the Adam Carolla Show! The new home for the rantings and ravings of Adam CarollThe Adam Carolla Show is the #1 Daily Downloaded Podcast in the World. GET IT ON as Adam shares his thoughts on current events, relationships, airport security, specialty pizzas, politics, and anything else he can complain about. Five days a week and completely uncensored, Adam welcomes a wide range of guests to join him in studio for in depth interviews and a front row seat to his unparalleled ranting. Let's not forget Bryan Bishop (Bald Bryan) on sound effects.
Check it out as Adam hangs out with some of his pals like: Larry Miller, David Allen Grier, Dr. Drew Pinksy, Dana Gould, Doug Benson, and many, many more.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Maria Menounos + Sam Delcanto
item.description: Maria Menounos talks openly about her brain tumor diagnosis, recovering after surgery, and how her life has changed for the better. Sam Delcanto also calls in to discuss the next round of celebrity speaking engagements to look forward to.
item.content:encoded: Maria Menounos talks openly about her brain tumor diagnosis, recovering after surgery, and how her life has changed for the better. Sam Delcanto also calls in to discuss the next round of celebrity speaking engagements to look forward to.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): March Gradness Elite Eight, Bryan S**** On Your Point, and Party Pals’ Paul Rugg

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Undefeated Boxer Mike Lee + ‘March For Our Lives’ Blah Blah Blog
item.description: Boxer Mike Lee talks about his undefeated record, and compliments Adam’s boxing skills while holding the focus pads. The guys also play a ‘March For Our Lives’ themed Blah Blah Blog, and discuss Stormy Daniels’ 60 Minutes interview.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Larry King + Brian Koppelman
item.description: Larry King calls in to discuss his new show with Dennis Miller, the importance of curiosity, and why he’s never retired. Plus Brian Koppelman tries to convince Adam to go soul cycling, and the guys react to the news.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Burt Reynolds, Billy Hayes, Adam Rifkin, and Sally Sussman
item.description: Burt Reynolds calls in to discuss his incredible career and new film, ‘The Last Movie Star’. Adam Rifkin, the writer/director of the film is also in studio, and later Billy Hayes and Sally Sussman discuss ‘Midnight Return: The Story of Billy Hayes and Turkey’. Be sure to stick around to hear who’s moving on to the Elite Eight of March Gradness.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): David Crosby and Courtney Moorehead Balaker + Vinnie Tortorich
item.description: David Crosby talks about leaving Crosby Stills and Nash, reconnecting with his long lost son, and how going to prison saved his life. Courtney Moorhead Balaker also talks about her powerful new film, and Vinnie Tortorich plays a round of the March Gradness Sweet 16.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Judd Apatow + Jeff Cesario and More March Gradness Sweet 16
item.description: Judd Apatow returns to discuss the new Garry Shandling documentary, being satisfied by your work, and observations he’s made raising two daughters. Plus, Chet Waterhouse comments on the next round of March Gradness.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Jimmy O. Yang + 'Coach Tony Bennett'
item.description: Jimmy O. Yang chats with the gang about Silicon Valley, his new book, and the next round of March Grandness. Plus, ‘Coach Tony Bennett’ calls in to talk about Virginia’s devastating loss to UMBC over the weekend.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Three Dog Night’s Chuck Negron + March Gradness Round 2
item.description: Three Dog Night’s Chuck Negron talks about the band’s rise to success, crazy behind the scenes drug stories, and the time he broke his wiener. Plus, enjoy the next round of March Gradness!

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Brad Meltzer + March Gradness Round 1 & Hooray for Baldywood
item.description: Brad Meltzer chats with the gang about working with a ‘war artist’ for his new book, as well as his thoughts on Harry Houdini, Stephen Hawking, and why the movie ‘Twins’ sucks. Plus, March Gradness begins, and Bald Bryan reviews the film ‘Patti Cake$’ for this week’s Baldywood.

item.title: ACS: Waymo's John Krafcik on Self-Driving Cars, Live from SXSW
item.description: Adam interviews the CEO of Waymo, John Krafcik, in front of a live audience at Native Bar & Kitchen at SXSW. They talk about the current state and exciting future of autonomous cars. Adam also pitches a few ideas of his own before the guys field some audience questions.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Digital Immortality with Dan Cummins + Oscar Jokes & Eric Bana themed Rotten Tomatoes Game
item.description: Dan Cummins joins for a show about burger flipping robots, Russell Crowe’s divorce auction, and a break in the case of Amelia Earhart. Plus, the guys hear a round of Oscar jokes that Adam wrote, and everyone plays an Eric Bana themed round of the Rotten Tomatoes Game.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Eric Bana + Gina’s Deviled Eggs
item.description: Eric Bana chats with the gang about his incredible career, obsession with cars and racing, and working with legendary directors like Steven Spielberg and Ridley Scott. Later, Adam critiques the first round of Deviled Eggs Gina’s ever made.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Oscar Recap with Jeff Cesario + Jon Taffer Returns
item.description: John Taffer talks about why you need to stop making excuses for yourself, instant gratification, and how to lead by example. Plus, Adam recaps his Oscar experience, and the guys react to highlights from the Academy Awards.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Hitchhiking with Will Gotay + ‘Bald Bryan S**** on Your Point’
item.description: Adam takes a call from an unusual person from his past: the guy who picked him up hitchhiking after his motorcycle was towed. The guys also take calls for a brand new game, ‘Bald Bryan S**** on Your Point’.

item.title: ACS (Part 1): Congressman Thomas Massie + Health Talk with Vinnie Tortorich and ‘Annihilation’ Baldywood
item.description: Congressman Thomas Massie calls in to discuss powering his house with Tesla car batteries, and predictions for the upcoming election cycle. Plus, Vinnie Tortorich chats with Adam about the effectiveness of different types of diets, and Bald Bryan reviews ‘Annihilation’ for this week’s Badlywood.
